definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Uncle and aunt launched a laundry with the blunt hunter.
sentences.chinese: 伯伯和伯母与直率的猎人创办了一家洗衣店。

sentences.english: MacTavish was characteristically forthright in his reply.
sentences.chinese: 维什以其一贯的直率作了回答。

sentences.english: Some of Fried and Hansson's ideas might seem too straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 弗里德和汉森的一些想法或许太直率了。

sentences.english: “Like friends, we discuss those differences honestly and forthrightly,” Clinton said at the opening session yesterday of the first day of meetings between U.
sentences.chinese: 我们像朋友一样坦诚直率地探讨彼此间存在的差异。

sentences.english: Appreciate Jiang Kejun's candor about use of "low-carbon city."
sentences.chinese: 欣赏姜克隽的直率，一语道破了“低碳城市”的用途。

sentences.english: This mistress of the milking-pail stared, but, making no answer to this round declaration.
sentences.chinese: 这位挤奶夫人瞪了一眼，可对这直率的宣言不置一词。

sentences.english: If you are a shallow bitch, I can be a blunt jerk.
sentences.chinese: 如果妳是肤浅的贱货，那我可能是直率的混蛋。

sentences.english: Hemingway 's plainspoken no-frills writing style became so famous that it was (and is) frequently parodied.
sentences.chinese: 海明威直率的写作风格常常成为其他作家模仿的对象。

sentences.english: She's flat-out brilliant, easily one of the best legal minds I've ever met.
sentences.chinese: 她直率的辉煌，很容易的最好的法律人才是我见过的。

sentences.english: Our neighbor, Mae was a tall slender woman with a quiet, sincere demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 我们的邻居，梅姨，个子高挑，苗条，文静，直率。

sentences.english: I lide her all the better for her plain speaking.
sentences.chinese: 我因为她说话直率而更加喜欢她。

sentences.english: And so that frank and candid assessment on our part will continue.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们一方的直率和坦诚评估将继续下去。

sentences.english: Mr Bing, unlike so many of his predecessors, is wonderfully frank.
sentences.chinese: 必应先生，和很多他的前任不同，为人非常直率。

sentences.english: The Cohens were shown into the dentist's office, where Mr.
sentences.chinese: 直率的牙病患者科恩夫妇被领进牙医办公室。

sentences.english: The charm of your drug addled candor knows no bounds.
sentences.chinese: 你吃药后直率的样子还真是魅力无限啊。

sentences.english: The frank man put the first-rank blank blanket into the tan tank.
sentences.chinese: 直率的男子将一流空白毛毯放进黝黑的大容器。

definition: frank and outspoken (idiom)/straight speaking/to say what one thinks
to make a clear difference between what one likes and what one hates/to have well-defined likes and dislikes
going directly (without detour)/(fig.) direct/straightforward (in one's manner or speech)
to stop at nothing (idiom)/to dare to do anything
